title: Big Buck Bunny
description: A large and lovable rabbit deals with three mischievous rodents. A classic open-source film by the Blender Foundation.
name: http://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/gtv-videos-bucket/sample/BigBuckBunny.mp4

title: Sintel
description: A lonely girl, Sintel, is on a journey to find her companion, a baby dragon she calls Scales.
name: /videos/video.mp4

title: Tears of Steel
description: In a dystopian future, a group of warriors and scientists fight to save the world from destructive robots.
name: /videos/video2.mkv

title: Elephants Dream
description: Two strange characters explore a surreal, dream-like machine. The first open-source film created with Blender.
name: http://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/gtv-videos-bucket/sample/ElephantsDream.mp4
